an8.10:2.5: tena paraputtena visodhitena → kiṁ vo paraputto viheṭhiyati (bj); kiṁ paraputto viheṭheti (sya-all); kiṁ vo paraputtā viheṭheti (pts1ed); kiṁ so paraputto visodheti (mr)
an8.10:2.9: samaṇadūsīvāyaṁ → samaṇarūpī cāyaṁ (mr) | samaṇakāraṇḍavo’ti → samaṇakaraṇḍavoti (sya-all, mr)
an8.10:5.1: phuṇamānassa → pūyamānassa (bj); vuyhamānassa (si); phusayamānassa (sya-all); vuvahyamānassa (pts1ed); punamānassa (?) | apavahati → apakassati (bj)
